IndexPage.title: Viggle AI Video Generator
IndexPage.description: Viggle AI video generator is a free tool that transforms a character image into a video with customizable movements.
IndexPage.pDescription: Viggle AI video generator is a free tool that transforms a character image into a video with customizable movements.
IndexPage.soraVideoExample: Example videos and prompts generated by Viggle AI
IndexPage.fakeSoraTip: FakeViggle is designed to simulate the yet-to-be-released Viggle AI API.
IndexPage.soraTip: Developer has not released Viggle AI's API yet.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ｜
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing ViggleAI.app! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use ViggleAI.app, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We collect your personal data solely for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: ViggleAI.app does not knowingly collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at
privacyPolicy.p2_h1: How to use Viggle AI Video Generator
privacyPolicy.p2_1: Viggle AI Video Generator is a free AI video generator that can convert images to videos using AI motion capture.
privacyPolicy.p2_2: To access Viggle AI Video Generator, join the beta program through Discord. After joining, complete the questionnaires and agree to the server rules to get started.
privacyPolicy.p2_3: Viggle AI Video Generator offers features like character mix, character animate, and more for video creation. Users can view examples of what others have created within the Viggle AI Video Generator server.
privacyPolicy.p2_4: For the 'animate' feature, upload an image, provide a motion prompt, choose a background, and decide on fine-tuning. For the 'mix' feature, upload an image and a video, choose a background, and also decide on fine-tuning.
privacyPolicy.p2_5: After uploading, the video will be processed and displayed within 2 to 5 minutes.
privacyPolicy.how_title: How to use Viggle AI Video Generator
privacyPolicy.how_description: Unlock the power of Viggle AI Video Generator! Learn how to convert images to captivating videos using AI motion capture. Join the Discord beta, explore features, and create stunning videos in minutes.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service ｜
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of Viggleai.app (the "Service"), provided by Viggleai.app ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: Viggleai.app provides a browser interface for Viggle AI, allowing users to generate text-to-video easily.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

indexQuestion.h2_1: How to use Viggle AI video generator in discord
indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: To make the most of the Viggle AI video generator in Discord, simply follow these steps:
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: 1. Join the Viggle AI Discord group by clicking on the invite link.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p3: 2. Once you're in, head over to the animate channel.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p4: 3. Now, you can start using the Viggle AI video generator commands by typing them in.
indexQuestion.h5_1: How to use /mix in Viggle AI video generator:
indexQuestion.h5_1_p1: 1. upload an image with a clear character in the discord channel
indexQuestion.h5_1_p2: 2. upload a video featuring clear motion
indexQuestion.h5_1_p3: 3. You'll receive a video featuring the character moving as intended.
indexQuestion.h5_2: How to use /animate in Viggle AI video generator:
indexQuestion.h5_2_p1: 1. upload an image with a clear character
indexQuestion.h5_2_p2: 2. describe the motion you want your character to do
indexQuestion.h5_2_p3: 3. You'll receive a Viggle AI video featuring the character moving as you described.
indexQuestion.h3_2: Tips for your uploaded materials in Viggle AI video generator:
indexQuestion.h5_3: containing only one character with full body, facing the front.
indexQuestion.h5_4: showcasing clear human motion, no more than 30s, resolution higher than 720p.
indexQuestion.h2_2: How to download Viggle AI video
indexQuestion.h2_3: Once the video is made in the Viggle AI Discord group, you'll find a download option on the video created by Viggle AI. Just tap on the button to save it to your computer. Viggle AI is currently only available on Discord, so there's no app or apk to download.
indexQuestion.h2_4_p1: How to use Viggle AI prompt? Go to Viggle AI discord server, paste the prompt when using  '/animate', '/ideate', or '/character' commands.
indexQuestion.h2_5: What is Viggle AI video generator
indexQuestion.h2_6: Viggle AI video generator is a cool free tool that can turn a character image into a video with the movements you want. You can make dancing videos, sports videos, or funny videos with any character you like. It's used a lot in games, art, creativity, singing, dancing, music, sports, and more!
indexQuestion.h2_8: The Viggle AI app or apk hasn't been launched yet. Currently, there is only an app called Viggle AI Video Guides available on Google Play. This app, developed by a third party, solely focuses on teaching users how to use Viggle AI. As for the release date of the Viggle AI app on the app store, the developer hasn't provided any information about it. However, you can still generate video viggle ai in a Discord group using your mobile phone.

worksPage.title: Works: Generate video history.
worksPage.pDescription: Viggleai.app is an open-source project that simplifies video creation by allowing users to generate videos online with Viggle AI's model using text, featuring easy one-click website deployment.

playgroundPage.title: Playground: Generate video simply.
playgroundPage.pDescription: Viggleai.app is an open-source project that simplifies video creation by allowing users to generate videos online with Viggle AI's  model using text, featuring easy one-click website deployment.
